<h1><span lang="EN-US"><a href="http://blog.csdn.net/ShineLeeX/archive/2006/03/27/640245.aspx"><span lang="ZH-CN" style="color:windowtext;text-decoration:none;text-underline:none">人工智能语言——</span><span style="color:windowtext;text-decoration:none;text-underline:none">PROLOG</span></a></span><span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></h1>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="center" style="mso-margin-top-alt:auto;text-align:center;
mso-pagination:widow-orphan;layout-grid-mode:char;background:white"><span style="font-size:12.0pt;font-family:楷体_GB2312;mso-hansi-font-family:宋体;
mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">张家华</span><span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="center" style="mso-margin-top-alt:auto;text-align:center;
mso-pagination:widow-orphan;layout-grid-mode:char;background:white"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:12.0pt;font-family:楷体_GB2312;mso-hansi-font-family:
宋体;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">(</span><span style="font-size:12.0pt;font-family:楷体_GB2312;mso-hansi-font-family:宋体;
mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">浙江师范大学教育技术系<span lang="EN-US">)</span></span><span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" style="mso-margin-top-alt:auto;mso-pagination:widow-orphan;
layout-grid-mode:char;background:white"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:10.5pt;
font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:楷体_GB2312;mso-fareast-font-family:楷体_GB2312;
mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt"> </span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:10.5pt;font-family:宋体;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
0pt"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-top:5.0pt;text-indent:21.0pt;mso-char-indent-count:
2.0;background:white"><span style="font-size:10.5pt;mso-bidi-font-size:15.0pt;
font-family:黑体;mso-ascii-font-family:宋体;mso-hansi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
0pt">摘</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:10.5pt;mso-bidi-font-size:15.0pt;
font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-font-family:黑体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">  </span><span style="font-size:10.5pt;
mso-bidi-font-size:15.0pt;font-family:黑体;mso-ascii-font-family:宋体;mso-hansi-font-family:
宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">要</span><span style="font-size:10.5pt;mso-bidi-font-size:
15.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">　</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:10.5pt;font-family:楷体_GB2312;mso-hansi-font-family:宋体;
mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">Prolog</span><span style="font-size:10.5pt;font-family:楷体_GB2312;mso-hansi-font-family:宋体;
mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">是人工智能语言的一个典型代表。本文简要阐述了人工智能语言及其特点，并通过实例介绍了<span lang="EN-US">Prolog</span>语言及其基本结构。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:10.5pt;
font-family:宋体;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-top:5.0pt;text-indent:21.0pt;mso-char-indent-count:
2.0;background:white"><span style="font-size:10.5pt;mso-bidi-font-size:15.0pt;
font-family:黑体;mso-ascii-font-family:宋体;mso-hansi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
0pt">关键词</span><span style="font-size:10.5pt;mso-bidi-font-size:15.0pt;
font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">　</span><span style="font-size:10.5pt;
font-family:楷体_GB2312;mso-hansi-font-family:宋体;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;
mso-font-kerning:0pt">人工智能语言　<span lang="EN-US">Prolog</span></span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:10.5pt;font-family:宋体;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;
mso-font-kerning:0pt"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p style="text-align:justify;text-justify:inter-ideograph"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:10.5pt"> <o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" style="mso-margin-top-alt:auto;mso-margin-bottom-alt:auto;
text-indent:21.0pt;mso-char-indent-count:2.0;mso-pagination:widow-orphan;
tab-stops:list 0cm;background:white"><span style="font-size:10.5pt;font-family:
宋体;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">在国家高中信息技术课程新标准的《人工智能初步》选修模块中，要求学生通过学习，</span><span style="font-size:10.5pt;mso-bidi-font-size:15.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
0pt">“</span><span style="font-size:10.5pt;font-family:楷体_GB2312;mso-hansi-font-family:
宋体;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">了解一种人工智能语言的基本数据结构和程序结构，掌握相关概念，知道人工智能语言的主要特征。……初步学会使用该语言设计程序求解简单问题，并能够上机调试、执行相应的程序。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:10.5pt;font-family:宋体;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;
mso-font-kerning:0pt">”</span><span style="font-size:10.5pt;font-family:宋体;
mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">事实上，广大的中小学信息技术教师对于<span lang="EN-US">Basic</span>、<span lang="EN-US">C</span>等过程式程序设计语言大多比较熟悉。那么<span lang="EN-US">,</span>什么是人工智能语言<span lang="EN-US">? Prolog</span>有哪些特点<span lang="EN-US">?</span>目前常用的软件版本有哪些<span lang="EN-US">?</span>这就是本文准备回答的问题。<span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" style="mso-margin-top-alt:auto;text-indent:21.0pt;
mso-char-indent-count:2.0;mso-pagination:widow-orphan;layout-grid-mode:char;
background:white"><span style="font-size:10.5pt;font-family:黑体;mso-ascii-font-family:
宋体;mso-hansi-font-family:宋体;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">一、什么是人工智能语言</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:10.5pt;font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-font-family:黑体;
mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-top:6.9pt;text-indent:21.0pt;mso-char-indent-count:
2.0;mso-pagination:widow-orphan;layout-grid-mode:char;background:white"><span style="font-size:10.5pt;font-family:宋体;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
0pt">人工智能（<span lang="EN-US">AI</span>）语言是一类适应于人工智能和知识工程领域的、具有符号处理和逻辑推理能力的计算机程序设计语言。能够用它来编写程序求解非数值计算、知识处理、推理、规划、决策等具有智能的各种复杂问题。<span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-top:6.9pt;text-indent:21.0pt;mso-char-indent-count:
2.0;mso-pagination:widow-orphan;layout-grid-mode:char;background:white"><span style="font-size:10.5pt;font-family:宋体;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
0pt">典型的人工智能语言主要有<span lang="EN-US">LISP</span>、<span lang="EN-US">Prolog</span>、<span lang="EN-US">Smalltalk</span>、<span lang="EN-US">C++</span>等。<span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-top:6.9pt;text-indent:21.0pt;mso-char-indent-count:
2.0;mso-pagination:widow-orphan;layout-grid-mode:char;background:white"><span style="font-size:10.5pt;font-family:宋体;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
0pt">一般来说，人工智能语言应具备如下特点：<span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-top:6.9pt;text-indent:21.0pt;mso-char-indent-count:
2.0;mso-pagination:widow-orphan;layout-grid-mode:char;background:white"><span style="font-size:10.5pt;font-family:宋体;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
0pt">·具有符号处理能力（即非数值处理能力）；<span lang="EN-US"> <o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-top:6.9pt;text-indent:21.0pt;mso-char-indent-count:
2.0;mso-pagination:widow-orphan;layout-grid-mode:char;background:white"><span style="font-size:10.5pt;font-family:宋体;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
0pt">·适合于结构化程序设计，编程容易；<span lang="EN-US"> <o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-top:6.9pt;text-indent:21.0pt;mso-char-indent-count:
2.0;mso-pagination:widow-orphan;layout-grid-mode:char;background:white"><span style="font-size:10.5pt;font-family:宋体;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
0pt">·具有递归功能和回溯功能；<span lang="EN-US"> <o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-top:6.9pt;text-indent:21.0pt;mso-char-indent-count:
2.0;mso-pagination:widow-orphan;layout-grid-mode:char;background:white"><span style="font-size:10.5pt;font-family:宋体;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
0pt">·具有人机交互能力；<span lang="EN-US"> <o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-top:6.9pt;text-indent:21.0pt;mso-char-indent-count:
2.0;mso-pagination:widow-orphan;layout-grid-mode:char;background:white"><span style="font-size:10.5pt;font-family:宋体;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
0pt">·适合于推理；<span lang="EN-US"> <o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-top:6.9pt;text-indent:21.0pt;mso-char-indent-count:
2.0;mso-pagination:widow-orphan;layout-grid-mode:char;background:white"><span style="font-size:10.5pt;font-family:宋体;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
0pt">·既有把过程与说明式数据结构混合起来的能力，又有辨别数据、确定控制的模式匹配机制。<span lang="EN-US"> <o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-top:6.9pt;text-indent:21.0pt;mso-char-indent-count:
2.0;mso-pagination:widow-orphan;layout-grid-mode:char;background:white"><span style="font-size:10.5pt;font-family:宋体;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
0pt">人们可能会问，用人工智能语言解决问题与传统的方法有什么区别呢？<span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-top:6.9pt;text-indent:21.0pt;mso-char-indent-count:
2.0;mso-pagination:widow-orphan;layout-grid-mode:char;background:white"><span style="font-size:10.5pt;font-family:宋体;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
0pt">事实上，在解决一些复杂的、非结构化的问题时，人工智能方法与传统方法有着差别。<span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-top:6.9pt;text-indent:21.0pt;mso-char-indent-count:
2.0;mso-pagination:widow-orphan;layout-grid-mode:char;background:white"><span style="font-size:10.5pt;font-family:宋体;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
0pt">传统方法通常把问题的全部知识以各种的模型表达在固定程序中，问题的求解完全在程序制导下按着预先安排好的步骤一步一步（逐条）执行。解决问题的思路与冯·诺依曼式计算机结构相吻合。当前大型数据库法、数学模型法、统计方法等都是严格结构化的方法。<span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-top:6.9pt;text-indent:21.0pt;mso-char-indent-count:
2.0;mso-pagination:widow-orphan;layout-grid-mode:char;background:white"><span style="font-size:10.5pt;font-family:宋体;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
0pt">对于人工智能技术要解决的问题，往往无法把全部知识都体现在固定的程序中。通常需要建立一个知识库（包含事实和推理规则），程序根据环境和所给的输入信息以及所要解决的问题来决定自己的行动，所以它是在环境模式的制导下的推理过程。这种方法有极大的灵活性、对话能力、有自我解释能力和学习能力。这种方法对解决一些条件和目标不大明确或不完备，（即不能很好地形式化，不好描述）的非结构化问题比传统方法好。它采用试探法来解决问题。人工智能也尚未发展到完全能解决这类问题的全部问题。这类问题是人工智能研究要解决的问题。随之而来也希望计算机硬件结构也来一个革命，突破冯·诺依曼体系结构。<span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" style="mso-margin-top-alt:auto;text-indent:21.0pt;
mso-char-indent-count:2.0;mso-pagination:widow-orphan;layout-grid-mode:char;
background:white"><span style="font-size:10.5pt;font-family:黑体;mso-ascii-font-family:
宋体;mso-hansi-font-family:宋体;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">二、</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:10.5pt;font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-font-family:黑体;
mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">Prolog</span><span style="font-size:10.5pt;font-family:黑体;mso-ascii-font-family:宋体;mso-hansi-font-family:
宋体;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">语言及其基本结构</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:10.5pt;font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-font-family:黑体;
mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-top:6.9pt;text-indent:21.0pt;mso-char-indent-count:
2.0;mso-pagination:widow-orphan;layout-grid-mode:char;background:white"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:10.5pt;font-family:宋体;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;
mso-font-kerning:0pt">Prolog</span><span style="font-size:10.5pt;font-family:
宋体;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">是当代最有影响的人工智能语言之一，由于该语言很适合表达人的思维和推理规则，在自然语言理解、机器定理证明、专家系统等方面得到了广泛的应用，已经成为人工智能应用领域的强有力的开发语言。<span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-top:6.9pt;text-indent:21.0pt;mso-char-indent-count:
2.0;mso-pagination:widow-orphan;layout-grid-mode:char;background:white"><span style="font-size:10.5pt;font-family:宋体;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
0pt">现在的<span lang="EN-US">Prolog</span>语言有许多版本，但它们的核心部分都是一样的。<span lang="EN-US">Prolog</span>的基本语句仅有三种，即事实、规则和目标三种类型的语句，且都用谓词表示，因而程序逻辑性强，文法简捷，清晰易懂。另一方面，<span lang="EN-US">Prolog</span>是陈述性语言，一旦给它提交必要的事实和规则之后，<span lang="EN-US">Prolog</span>就使用内部的演绎推理机制自动求解程序给定的目标，而不需要在程序中列出详细的求解步骤。<span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-top:6.9pt;text-indent:21.0pt;mso-char-indent-count:
2.0;background:white"><span style="font-size:10.5pt;font-family:宋体;mso-bidi-font-family:
宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">１、事实<span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-top:6.9pt;text-indent:21.0pt;mso-char-indent-count:
2.0;mso-pagination:widow-orphan;layout-grid-mode:char;background:white"><span style="font-size:10.5pt;font-family:宋体;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
0pt">事实用来说明一个问题中已知的对象和它们之间的关系。在<span lang="EN-US">Prolog</span>程序中，事实由谓词名及用括号括起来的一个或几个对象组成。谓词和对象可由用户自己定义。<span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-top:5.0pt;margin-right:0cm;margin-bottom:0cm;
margin-left:129.6pt;margin-bottom:.0001pt;text-indent:-114.6pt;background:white"><span style="font-size:10.5pt;font-family:宋体;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
0pt">例如，谓词<span lang="EN-US">likes(bill</span>，<span lang="EN-US">book).<o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-top:6.9pt;text-indent:21.0pt;mso-char-indent-count:
2.0;mso-pagination:widow-orphan;layout-grid-mode:char;background:white"><span style="font-size:10.5pt;font-family:宋体;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
0pt">是一个名为<span lang="EN-US">like</span>的关系，表示对象<span lang="EN-US">bill</span>和<span lang="EN-US">book</span>之间有喜欢的关系。<span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-top:6.9pt;text-indent:21.0pt;mso-char-indent-count:
2.0;background:white"><span style="font-size:10.5pt;font-family:宋体;mso-bidi-font-family:
宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">２、规则<span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-top:6.9pt;text-indent:21.0pt;mso-char-indent-count:
2.0;mso-pagination:widow-orphan;layout-grid-mode:char;background:white"><span style="font-size:10.5pt;font-family:宋体;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
0pt">规则由几个互相有依赖性的简单句（谓词）组成，用来描述事实之间的依赖关系。从形式上看，规则由左边表示结论的后件谓词和右边表示条件的前提谓词组成。<span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-top:6.9pt;text-indent:21.0pt;mso-char-indent-count:
2.0;mso-pagination:widow-orphan;layout-grid-mode:char;background:white"><span style="font-size:10.5pt;font-family:宋体;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
0pt">例如，规则<span lang="EN-US"> bird(X):-animal(X),has(X,feather).<o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-top:6.9pt;text-indent:21.0pt;mso-char-indent-count:
2.0;mso-pagination:widow-orphan;layout-grid-mode:char;background:white"><span style="font-size:10.5pt;font-family:宋体;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
0pt">表示凡是动物并且有羽毛，那么它就是鸟。<span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-top:6.9pt;text-indent:21.0pt;mso-char-indent-count:
2.0;background:white"><span style="font-size:10.5pt;font-family:宋体;mso-bidi-font-family:
宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">３、目标（问题）<span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-top:6.9pt;text-indent:21.0pt;mso-char-indent-count:
2.0;mso-pagination:widow-orphan;layout-grid-mode:char;background:white"><span style="font-size:10.5pt;font-family:宋体;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
0pt">把事实和规则写进<span lang="EN-US">Prolog</span>程序中后，就可以向<span lang="EN-US">Prolog</span>询问有关问题的答案，询问的问题就是程序运行的目标。目标的结构与事实或规则相同，可以是一个简单的谓词，也可以是多个谓词的组合。目标分内、外两种，内部目标写在程序中，外部目标在程序运行时由用户手工键入。<span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-top:6.9pt;text-indent:21.0pt;mso-char-indent-count:
2.0;mso-pagination:widow-orphan;layout-grid-mode:char;background:white"><span style="font-size:10.5pt;font-family:宋体;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
0pt">例如问题<span lang="EN-US"> ?-student(john).<o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-top:6.9pt;text-indent:21.0pt;mso-char-indent-count:
2.0;mso-pagination:widow-orphan;layout-grid-mode:char;background:white"><span style="font-size:10.5pt;font-family:宋体;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
0pt">表示“<span lang="EN-US">john</span>是学生吗？”<span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p style="text-align:justify;text-justify:inter-ideograph"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:10.5pt"> <o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-top:5.0pt;text-indent:21.0pt;mso-char-indent-count:
2.0;background:white"><span style="font-size:10.5pt;font-family:黑体;mso-ascii-font-family:
宋体;mso-hansi-font-family:宋体;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">三</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:10.5pt;font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-font-family:黑体;
mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">.Prolog</span><span style="font-size:10.5pt;font-family:黑体;mso-ascii-font-family:宋体;mso-hansi-font-family:
宋体;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">程序的简单例子</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:10.5pt;font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-font-family:黑体;
mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-top:6.9pt;text-indent:21.0pt;mso-char-indent-count:
2.0;mso-pagination:widow-orphan;layout-grid-mode:char;background:white"><span style="font-size:10.5pt;font-family:宋体;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
0pt">以下两个例子在<span lang="EN-US">Turbo Prolog 2.0</span>环境下运行通过。<span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-top:6.9pt;text-indent:21.0pt;mso-char-indent-count:
2.0;mso-pagination:widow-orphan;layout-grid-mode:char;background:white"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:10.5pt;font-family:宋体;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;
mso-font-kerning:0pt">[ </span><span style="font-size:10.5pt;font-family:宋体;
mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">注：一个<span lang="EN-US">Turbo Prolog</span>程序至少包括谓词段、子句段和目标段三项。目标可以包含在程序中，也可以在程序运行时给出。<span lang="EN-US">]<o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-top:6.9pt;text-indent:21.0pt;mso-char-indent-count:
2.0;mso-pagination:widow-orphan;layout-grid-mode:char;background:white"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:10.5pt;font-family:宋体;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;
mso-font-kerning:0pt"> <o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-top:6.9pt;text-indent:21.0pt;mso-char-indent-count:
2.0;mso-pagination:widow-orphan;layout-grid-mode:char;background:white"><span style="font-size:10.5pt;font-family:宋体;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
0pt">例<span lang="EN-US">1  </span>谁是<span lang="EN-US">john</span>的朋友？<span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-top:6.9pt;text-indent:21.0pt;mso-char-indent-count:
2.0;mso-pagination:widow-orphan;layout-grid-mode:char;background:white"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:10.5pt;font-family:宋体;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;
mso-font-kerning:0pt">predicates                       /*</span><span style="font-size:10.5pt;font-family:宋体;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
0pt">谓词段，对要用的谓词名和参数进行说明<span lang="EN-US">*/<o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-top:6.9pt;text-indent:21.0pt;mso-char-indent-count:
2.0;mso-pagination:widow-orphan;layout-grid-mode:char;background:white"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:10.5pt;font-family:宋体;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;
mso-font-kerning:0pt">  likes(symbol,
symbol)<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-top:6.9pt;text-indent:21.0pt;mso-char-indent-count:
2.0;mso-pagination:widow-orphan;layout-grid-mode:char;background:white"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:10.5pt;font-family:宋体;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;
mso-font-kerning:0pt">  friend(symbol,
symbol)<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-top:6.9pt;text-indent:21.0pt;mso-char-indent-count:
2.0;mso-pagination:widow-orphan;layout-grid-mode:char;background:white"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:10.5pt;font-family:宋体;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;
mso-font-kerning:0pt">clauses                         /*</span><span style="font-size:10.5pt;font-family:宋体;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
0pt">子句段，存放所有的事实和规则<span lang="EN-US">*/<o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-top:6.9pt;text-indent:21.0pt;mso-char-indent-count:
2.0;mso-pagination:widow-orphan;layout-grid-mode:char;background:white"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:10.5pt;font-family:宋体;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;
mso-font-kerning:0pt"> 
likes(bell,sports).                               /*</span><span style="font-size:10.5pt;font-family:宋体;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
0pt">前<span lang="EN-US">4</span>行是事实<span lang="EN-US">*/<o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-top:6.9pt;text-indent:21.0pt;mso-char-indent-count:
2.0;mso-pagination:widow-orphan;layout-grid-mode:char;background:white"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:10.5pt;font-family:宋体;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;
mso-font-kerning:0pt"> 
likes(mary,music).<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-top:6.9pt;text-indent:21.0pt;mso-char-indent-count:
2.0;mso-pagination:widow-orphan;layout-grid-mode:char;background:white"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:10.5pt;font-family:宋体;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;
mso-font-kerning:0pt">  likes(mary,sports).<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-top:6.9pt;text-indent:21.0pt;mso-char-indent-count:
2.0;mso-pagination:widow-orphan;layout-grid-mode:char;background:white"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:10.5pt;font-family:宋体;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;
mso-font-kerning:0pt"> 
likes(jane,smith).<o:p></o:p></span></p>

0pt">四、<span lang="EN-US">Prolog</span>语言的常用版本<span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-top:6.9pt;text-indent:21.0pt;mso-char-indent-count:
2.0;mso-pagination:widow-orphan;layout-grid-mode:char;background:white"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:10.5pt;font-family:宋体;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;
mso-font-kerning:0pt">Prolog</span><span style="font-size:10.5pt;font-family:
宋体;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">语言最早是由法国马赛大学的<span lang="EN-US">Colmerauer</span>和他的研究小组于<span lang="EN-US">1972</span>年研制成功。早期的<span lang="EN-US">Prolog</span>版本都是解释型的，自<span lang="EN-US">1986</span>年美国<span lang="EN-US">Borland</span>公司推出编译型<span lang="EN-US">Prolog,</span>即<span lang="EN-US">Turbo Prolog</span>以后，<span lang="EN-US">Prolog</span>便很快在<span lang="EN-US">PC</span>机上流行起来。后来又经历了<span lang="EN-US">PDC PROLOG</span>、<span lang="EN-US">Visual Prolog</span>不同版本的发展。并行的逻辑语言也于<span lang="EN-US">80</span>年代初开始研制，其中比较著名的有<span lang="EN-US">PARLOG</span>、<span lang="EN-US">Concurrent PROLOG</span>等。<span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-top:6.9pt;text-indent:21.0pt;mso-char-indent-count:
2.0;mso-pagination:widow-orphan;layout-grid-mode:char;background:white"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:10.5pt;font-family:宋体;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;
mso-font-kerning:0pt">1</span><span style="font-size:10.5pt;font-family:宋体;
mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">、<span lang="EN-US">Turbo Prolog<o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-top:6.9pt;text-indent:21.0pt;mso-char-indent-count:
2.0;mso-pagination:widow-orphan;layout-grid-mode:char;background:white"><span style="font-size:10.5pt;font-family:宋体;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
0pt">由美国<span lang="EN-US">Prolog</span>开发中心（<span lang="EN-US">Prolog Development
Center, PDC</span>）<span lang="EN-US">1986</span>年开发成功、<span lang="EN-US">Borland</span>公司对外发行，其<span lang="EN-US">1.0</span>，<span lang="EN-US">2.0</span>，<span lang="EN-US">2.1</span>版本取名为<span lang="EN-US">Turbo Prolog</span>，主要在<span lang="EN-US">IBM PC</span>系列计算机，<span lang="EN-US">MS-DOS</span>环境下运行。<span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-top:6.9pt;text-indent:21.0pt;mso-char-indent-count:
2.0;mso-pagination:widow-orphan;layout-grid-mode:char;background:white"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:10.5pt;font-family:宋体;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;
mso-font-kerning:0pt">2</span><span style="font-size:10.5pt;font-family:宋体;
mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">、<span lang="EN-US">PDC Prolog<o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-top:6.9pt;text-indent:21.0pt;mso-char-indent-count:
2.0;mso-pagination:widow-orphan;layout-grid-mode:char;background:white"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:10.5pt;font-family:宋体;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;
mso-font-kerning:0pt">1990</span><span style="font-size:10.5pt;font-family:
宋体;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">年后，<span lang="EN-US">PDC</span>推出新的版本，更名为<span lang="EN-US">PDC Prolog 3.0</span>，<span lang="EN-US">3.2</span>，它把运行环境扩展到<span lang="EN-US">OS/2</span>操作系统，并且向全世界发行。它的主要特点是<span lang="EN-US">:<o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-top:6.9pt;text-indent:21.0pt;mso-char-indent-count:
2.0;mso-pagination:widow-orphan;layout-grid-mode:char;background:white"><span style="font-size:10.5pt;font-family:宋体;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
0pt">·速度快。编译及运行速度都很快，产生的代码非常紧凑。<span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-top:6.9pt;text-indent:21.0pt;mso-char-indent-count:
2.0;mso-pagination:widow-orphan;layout-grid-mode:char;background:white"><span style="font-size:10.5pt;font-family:宋体;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
0pt">·用户界面友好。提供了图形化的集成开发环境。<span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-top:6.9pt;text-indent:21.0pt;mso-char-indent-count:
2.0;mso-pagination:widow-orphan;layout-grid-mode:char;background:white"><span style="font-size:10.5pt;font-family:宋体;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
0pt">·提供了强有力的外部数据库系统。<span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-top:6.9pt;text-indent:21.0pt;mso-char-indent-count:
2.0;mso-pagination:widow-orphan;layout-grid-mode:char;background:white"><span style="font-size:10.5pt;font-family:宋体;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
0pt">·提供了一个用<span lang="EN-US">PDC Prolog</span>编写的<span lang="EN-US">Prolog</span>解释起源代码。用户可以用它研究<span lang="EN-US">Prolog</span>的内部机制，并创建自己的专用编程语言、推理机、专家系统外壳或程序接口。<span lang="EN-US"> <o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-top:6.9pt;text-indent:21.0pt;mso-char-indent-count:
2.0;mso-pagination:widow-orphan;layout-grid-mode:char;background:white"><span style="font-size:10.5pt;font-family:宋体;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
0pt">·提供了与其他语言（如<span lang="EN-US">C</span>、<span lang="EN-US">Pascal</span>、<span lang="EN-US">Fortran</span>等）的接口。<span lang="EN-US">Prolog</span>和其他语言可以相互调用对方的子程序。<span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-top:6.9pt;text-indent:21.0pt;mso-char-indent-count:
2.0;mso-pagination:widow-orphan;layout-grid-mode:char;background:white"><span style="font-size:10.5pt;font-family:宋体;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
0pt">·具有强大的图形功能。支持<span lang="EN-US">Turbo C</span>、<span lang="EN-US">Turbo Pascal</span>同样的功能。<span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-top:6.9pt;text-indent:21.0pt;mso-char-indent-count:
2.0;mso-pagination:widow-orphan;layout-grid-mode:char;background:white"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:10.5pt;font-family:宋体;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;
mso-font-kerning:0pt">3</span><span style="font-size:10.5pt;font-family:宋体;
mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">、<span lang="EN-US">Visual Prolog<o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-top:6.9pt;text-indent:21.0pt;mso-char-indent-count:
2.0;mso-pagination:widow-orphan;layout-grid-mode:char;background:white"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:10.5pt;font-family:宋体;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;
mso-font-kerning:0pt">Visual Prolog</span><span style="font-size:10.5pt;
font-family:宋体;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">是基于<span lang="EN-US">Prolog</span>语言的可视化集成开发环境，是<span lang="EN-US">PDC</span>推出的基于<span lang="EN-US">Windows</span>环境的智能化编程工具。目前，<span lang="EN-US">Visual Prolog</span>在美国、西欧、日本、加拿大、澳大利亚等国家和地区十分流行，是国际上研究和开发智能化应用的主流工具之一。<span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-top:6.9pt;text-indent:21.0pt;mso-char-indent-count:
2.0;mso-pagination:widow-orphan;layout-grid-mode:char;background:white"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:10.5pt;font-family:宋体;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;
mso-font-kerning:0pt">Visual Prolog</span><span style="font-size:10.5pt;
font-family:宋体;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">具有模式匹配、递归、回溯、对象机制、事实数据库和谓词库等强大功能。它包含构建大型应用程序所需要的一切特性：图形开发环境、编译器、连接器和调试器，支持模块化和面向对象程序设计，支持系统级编程、文件操作、字符串处理、位级运算、算术与逻辑运算，以及与其它编程语言的接口。<span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-top:6.9pt;text-indent:21.0pt;mso-char-indent-count:
2.0;mso-pagination:widow-orphan;layout-grid-mode:char;background:white"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:10.5pt;font-family:宋体;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;
mso-font-kerning:0pt">Visual Prolog</span><span style="font-size:10.5pt;
font-family:宋体;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">包含一个全部使用<span lang="EN-US">Visual Prolog</span>语言写成的有效的开发环境，包含对话框、菜单、工具栏等编辑功能。<span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-top:6.9pt;text-indent:21.0pt;mso-char-indent-count:
2.0;mso-pagination:widow-orphan;layout-grid-mode:char;background:white"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:10.5pt;font-family:宋体;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;
mso-font-kerning:0pt">Visual Prolog</span><span style="font-size:10.5pt;
font-family:宋体;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">与<span lang="EN-US">SQL</span>数据库系统、<span lang="EN-US">C++</span>开发系统、以及<span lang="EN-US">Visual Basic</span>、<span lang="EN-US">Delphi</span>或<span lang="EN-US">Visual Age</span>等编程语言一样，也可以用来轻松地开发各种应用。<span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-top:6.9pt;text-indent:21.0pt;mso-char-indent-count:
2.0;mso-pagination:widow-orphan;layout-grid-mode:char;background:white"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:10.5pt;font-family:宋体;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;
mso-font-kerning:0pt">Visual Prolog</span><span style="font-size:10.5pt;
font-family:宋体;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">软件的下载地址为：<span lang="EN-US"><a href="http://www.visual-prolog.com/"><span style="color:windowtext;
text-decoration:none;text-underline:none">http://www.visual-prolog.com</span></a>
</span>。<span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></span></p>
